programme.title: Dr Xand's Con or Cure
programme.desc: The deadly effects of diet pills, and is breakfast the most important meal of the day?

programme.title: Clive Myrie's Italian Road Trip
programme.desc: Clive heads to the heart of southern Italy - where the sun shines brightest but foreign tourists are relatively few. Driving his red Fiat down the same roads as Daniel Craig's Aston Martin, Clive discovers how the James Bond franchise helped turn an abandoned town into a world heritage site, finds out why Puglia is the gay holiday capital of Italy, and learns to play in a traditional pizzica band.

programme.title: Coast to Coast Food Festival
programme.desc: Edith Bowman and Colin Murray explore the Glasgow Foodies' Festival, where they discover the secrets to the best egg fried rice with chef Jimmy Lee and how to spot "fake" vanilla. Food journalist Leyla Kazim investigates how many people it takes to make a bag of crisps, and chef Suzie Lee finds a delicious fishy surprise in Lough Neagh. Onkar Singh Purewal discover how a food stall has provided a lifeline for a Cardiff community.

programme.title: Coastal Defenders
programme.desc: A mooring structure called a dolphin has brought the Isle of Wight ferries to a standstill. In desperate need of repair, the whole ferry terminal must move to allow the Coastal Defenders dive team to swing into action and repair the seaworn structure. However, the team come across a mountain of discarded rubbish, ranging from teacups to prams, as they work day and night to get the job done on time.

programme.title: Lifeline
programme.desc: Entièrement tourné aux USA, Life Line retrace l'histoire des immigrés dans un monde d'autres que celui d'où ils viennent : adoption, déracinnement et la maîtrise des réalités.

programme.title: Nicky Campbell BBC News Talk
programme.desc: Nicky Campbell takes your calls on the day's talking points, hearing views and experiences from across the UK. Call 08085 909693 between 9am and 11am on weekdays (calls are free from mobiles and landlines).

programme.title: BBC News
programme.desc: A suivre, les dernières actualités présentées par les équipes rédactionnelles de la BBC, le très réputé radiodiffuseur du service public britannique. Créée en 1922 à Londres, la British Broadcast Corporation est connue pour être la plus ancienne société diffusant des programmes de radio ou de télévision au monde.

programme.title: Politics Live
programme.desc: Join presenter Jo Coburn as she discusses the latest political news and stories in a conversational format, covering the comings-and-goings from Westminster in the BBC's daily politics programme. Featuring opinions and arguments from all the sides of the political spectrum, the show invites informed and opinionated guests to share their views on the stories of the day.

programme.title: Impossible
programme.desc: Game show in which players must avoid giving impossible answers to a set of questions.

programme.title: Eggheads
programme.desc: Jeremy Vine hosts a general knowledge quiz featuring the greatest quiz team in Britain.

programme.title: Un menu en or
programme.desc: Des cuisiniers et des restaurateurs tentent de faire la promotion de leurs recettes devant des investisseurs. Les plus audacieux et talentueux ouvriront leur restaurant. (VO : Million Pound Menu).

programme.title: Cap sur l'Atlantique
programme.desc: Le Gulf Stream, qui charrie des nutriments à la surface, est une véritable source de vie pour de nombreuses espèces comme les cétacés ou les tortues luth.

programme.title: The Great British Sewing Bee
programme.desc: It's Sports Week, and the sewers must make a pair of trainers and a sports jacket.

programme.title: Flog It !
programme.desc: Today Flog It! comes from Boconnoc House deep in the Cornish countryside. The estate and house date back to 1086. Antiques expert Catherine Southon enthuses about a collection of airline memorabilia, and Nick Hall finds a jar, dug out of the ground, that contained the childhood remedy Virol. Paul Martin takes the oars in a traditional Cornish gig race.

programme.title: Richard Osman's House of Games
programme.desc: Matt Edmondson, Sabrina Grant, Andy Hamilton and Kirsty Wark test their general knowledge.

programme.title: Clive Myrie's Italian Road Trip
programme.desc: The village of Savoca has some of the best views in Sicily, which is why Martin Scorsese chose it to film The Godfather's wedding scene. Clive hangs out at the Bar Vitelli, made famous by the film, and chats to the café owner who played a bridesmaid. Staying just outside the village in a fishing hamlet that's been transformed into a unique hotel, Clive learns to make the perfect spaghetti sauce.

programme.title: Les motards poilus : Cooking Trip en Méditerranée
programme.desc: David Myers et Simon King, reprennent du service ! Direction la Méditerranée, pour une aventure gourmande gorgée de soleil. Cette fois-ci, les motards poilus partiront à la découverte des saveurs authentiques de cette fameuse cuisine méditerranéenne en se rendant en Italie, en traversant les îles Baléares pour terminer leur food trip sur les côtes espagnoles.

programme.title: Inside the Factory
programme.desc: Saison 7 Episode 8 Gregg Wallace explores the Ambrosia factory in Lifton, Devon, to reveal how it makes up to 360,000 rice puddings every single day. Cherry Healey is in the Po Valley in Italy to find out how fresh water from the Alps is used to grow more than a million tonnes of rice every year. And Ruth Goodman is serving up the history of school dinners. Année de réalisation : 2022

programme.title: Highland Cops
programme.desc: Officers are tipped off about a resident suspected of possessing an illegal weapon.

programme.title: Newsnight
programme.desc: The day's important national and international news stories. With Mark Urban.

programme.title: Les ombres du coeur
programme.desc: CS, dit "Jack", Lewis est une figure éminente de l'université d'Oxford. Professeur de littérature et conférencier réputé, ce quinquagénaire placide mène une vie routinière. Célibataire endurci, il vit avec son frère aîné, Warnie, et des universitaires vieillissants et misogynes, qui forment le cercle de ses rares amis. La seule étincelle de fraîcheur dans cette monotonie reste la correspondance qui s'est établie entre Lewis et Joy Gresham, une jeune romancière américaine d'origine juive, dont il apprécie l'intelligence et l'humour sarcastique. Après une première rencontre, Joy retourne aux Etats-Unis, où elle a entamé une procédure de divorce. Jack commence à la regretter mais entend bien privilégier le désir sur la possession et résiste à l'envie de déclarer son amour... Année de réalisation : 1993

programme.title: Pilgrimage: The Road to Santiago
programme.desc: With less than a week to go before they join tens of thousands of people in Fatima for the annual celebration of the Miracle of the Sun, the pilgrims decide to speed up their journey. They climb the 570 steps to the Sanctuary of Bom Jesus do Monte, try the centuries-old tradition of suckling pig in Mealhada, and visit the tomb of one of the country's most famous women, the queen and saint Isabel.

programme.title: MasterChef
programme.desc: Nine home cooks recreate their Family Favourite dish for a place in the next round.

programme.title: This is BBC Two
programme.desc: This is BBC Two.
